owl:Ontology.dc:bibliographicCitation: ***, Dr. Sabin-Corneliu Buraga, Web Applications Development, (RO) http://profs.info.uaic.ro/~busaco/teach/courses/wade/index.html/, UAIC, FII.
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Databases Ontology
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: The purpose of this ontology is to create the common conceptual framework for 'talking' about databases and/or related concepts.
owl:Ontology.dc:bibliographicCitation: ***, Pramod J. Sadalage and Martin Fowler. NoSQL Distilled: A Brief Guide to the Emerging World of Polyglot Persistence. Addison-Wesley Professional, 1st edition, 2012.
owl:Ontology.dc:description: The purpose of this ontology is to create the common conceptual framework for 'talking' about databases and/or related concepts.
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Databases Ontology
owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Daniel Amariei

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the concurrency control mechanism used by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Concurrency Control Mechanism

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the consistency model used by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Consistency Model

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the data model used by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Data Model

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the partitioning strategy used by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Partitioning Strategy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the processing model for a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Processing Model

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the data schema constraints for a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Data Schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the developer of a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Developer

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the implementation programming language of a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Implementation Programming Language

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the licensing restrictions.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has License

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the replication configuration strategy supported by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Replication Configuration Strategy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the replication protocol supported by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Replication Protocol

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the replication synchronization strategy supported by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Replication Synchronization Strategy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the licensing of a particular software product.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Software License

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the storage model used by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Storage Model

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the storage technology used by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Storage Technology

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the transaction granularity supported by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Transaction Granularity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the application type for which a particular DBMS is suitable for.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Suitable for Software Application

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the operating system supported by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Supports Operating System

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the platform supported by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Supports Platform

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the programming language supported by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Supports Programming Language

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the query language supported by a particular DBMS.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Supports Query Language

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the nature of the data used by a particular software application.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Uses Data

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the operation type used by a particular software applicatoin.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Uses Operation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the current version release date for a particular DBMS.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Current Version Release Date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the initial version release date for a particular DBMS.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Initial Version Release Date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies the Website for a particular DBMS.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Website

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies if a particular DBMS is operating system independent.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Is Operating System Independent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies if a particular DBMS is platform independent.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Is Platform Independent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies if a particular DBMS suports indexing.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Supports Indexing

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies if a particular DBMS is supports the MapReduce data processing model.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Supports MapReduce

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies if a particular DBMS suports replication.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Supports Replication

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies if a particular DBMS is supports transactions.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Supports Transactions

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: This property specifies if a particular DBMS is supports typing.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Supports Typing

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of asynchronous replication protocols.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Asynchronous Replication Protocol

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of batch processing models.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Batch Processing Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of CMS software applications.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: CMS Software Application

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of column family DBMSs.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Column Family DBMS

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of concurrency control mechanisms.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Concurrency Control Mechanism

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of data partitioning strategies.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Partitioning Strategy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of data processing models.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Processing Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of data schemas (e.g., rigid schema, flexible schema, etc.).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Data Schema

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of Database Management Systems (DBMSs).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Database Management System (DBMS)

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of E-Commerce software applications.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: E-Commerce Software Application

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of low-latency software applications.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Low-Latency Software Application

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of master-slave replication protocols.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Master-Slave Replication Protocol

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of operation types (e.g., OLTP, OLAP, query, transaction, etc.).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Operation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of peer-to-peer replication protocols.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Peer-to-Peer Replication Protocol

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of Quad store DBMSs.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Quad Store DBMS

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of recommendation software applications.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Recommendation Software Application

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of replication configuration strategies.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Replication Configuration Strategy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of replication synchronization strategies.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Replication Synchronization Strategy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of stream processing models.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stream Processing Model

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of synchronous replication protocols.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Synchronous Replication Protocol

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The class of triple store DBMSs.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Triple Store DBMS

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: An operations that performs aggregations (e.g., AVG, SUM, COUNT, etc.)
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Aggregation

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Data that expires after a certain ammount of time and needs to be deleted.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Expiring-Usage Data

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The concept of MapReduce, a distributed, batch, data processing model.
A transaction that spawns multiple operations.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Multi-Operation Transaction

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:commnet: Queries executed againsts data that is not stored in an uniform schema.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Query Against Varying Aggregate Data Structure

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Queries executed by the data content, not the identifying key of the data.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Query By Data

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The concept of sliding-window processing model data processing model.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Analytics Software Application
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The class of analytics software applications.
